properties.Name: SocialMediaPlatformUser

Columns.Name: SocialMediaPlatformId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Social Media Platform.

Columns.Name: SocialMediaPlatformUserId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Social Media Platform User.

Columns.Name: SocialMediaPlatformUserUsername
Columns.Description: The username used by the user of the Social Media Platform.

Columns.Name: SocialMediaPlatformUserName
Columns.Description: The name of the Social Media Platform User.

Columns.Name: SocialMediaPlatformUserSinceDate
Columns.Description: The date that the user created a social media platform user account.

Columns.Name: SocialMediaPlatformUserInfluencerIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the Social Media Platform User is an influencer.

Columns.Name: SocialMediaPlatformUserNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Social Media Platform User.

Properties.Description: A User of a Social Media Platform. Depending on the platform, a user can be used to represent an individual (party or customer), organization (party or customer), product, program, promotion or any other desired business object within the scope of an organization.
